name: Counter: Hold
effects: 30% chance to counter physical attacks with Counter: Hold (910408) to caster

desc_short: Chance to paralyze one enemy when attacked with physical attack

Chance, Gegner zu lähmen, wenn mit phys. Angriff attackiert.

desc_long: Chance to paralyze one enemy when attacked with physical attack
受到物理攻擊時一定機率對1名敵人施加麻痺效果。
